K12ekmuhr_u:5: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasaha[sreṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasamakrāmad
K12ekmuhr_u:6: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā\var{kṛtvā\lem \cod;
K12ekmuhr_u:7: kṛtya \Dutt} kānte nyasīda bhagavantam etad avocat /
K12ekmuhr_u:8: ñ1.4 idaṃ mama bhagavann ekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayam ekādaśabhi [kalpako]ṭībhir bhāṣitam /
K12ekmuhr_u:10: cet tarhi \Dutt} bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]m arthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya{ḥ}
K12ekmuhr_u:14: t) samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā<ḥ> prajāyā,
K12ekmuhr_u:15: yad anena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe\var{viṣa[dūṣa]ṇe \em \Hidas;
K12ekmuhr_u:16: viṣa[prahā]ṇe \em\Dutt} kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame na praśame,
K12ekmuhr_u:18: sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
K12ekmuhr_u:19: ñ1.8 sarvabuddhastutaḥ samanvāhṛto 'yaṃ hṛdaya<ṃ>. sarvatathāgatānumodito 'yaṃ hṛdayaṃ\var{hṛdayaṃ\lem \em; hṛdaye \cod}/
K12ekmuhr_u:20: ñ1.9 smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃ gaṅgānadībālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍā\var{cūḍā\lem \cod;
K12ekmuhr_u:27: saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatā<ḥ> sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
K12ekmuhr_u:28: ñ1.11 evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ mā\ill*hṛdayaṃ tasmāt tarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavya{ṇa}m /
K12ekmuhr_u:42: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
K12ekmuhr_u:48: or a different counting is required
K12ekmuhr_u:53: ñ1.28 [4] itaś cutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyate
K12ekmuhr_u:54: smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavann it daśānāṃ gaṅgānadībāl[u]kāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt{a} /
K12ekmuhr_u:57: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvabuddhānāṃ\var{sarvabuddhānāṃ\conj \Nagashima;
K12ekmuhr_u:61: yena \cod} bandhanabaddhā ye vadhyaprāptā\var{ye\rarr badhyaprāptā repeated \dittography
K12ekmuhr_u:62: \cod} ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatā<ḥ> tad anenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇam
K12ekmuhr_u:68: mahārdhiko \Dutt} 'yaṃ mama bhagavat hṛ[dayam] ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā catvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣa[yaṃ] gacchanti\var{gacchanti\lem \Dutt;

K12ekmuhr_u:74: these will happen as they are taught''
K12ekmuhr_u:77: mūlaṃ bhaviṣyati \Dutt} ye śroṣyanti prāk- eva japa-sādhana-ādibhiḥ /
K12ekmuhr_u:82: \Dutt: ``should be caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ''.} mām- uddiśya- upavasante\var{upavasante \cod;
